A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saying nothing of the disastrous mess of a narrative stretched thin by constant thread cycling between a plethora of irrelevant and disposable characters\, The Last Jedi is so afraid of genuine emotional reflection that it remains painfully insincere from start to finish\, constantly undermining and negating any honest feelings that might have been\, and echoes hollow\, cynical\, and soulless. Shockingly\, the literal worst Star Wars movie.
